name: The Caveman
description:
The Hunting begins...

You are a cave adventurer who usually goes out with friends to look at caves, but this time you are going solo.
There have been rumors of a mythical beast roaming the Hoover cave so you naturally want to check it out. But things don't go as expected, not at all.

Controls: Keyboard

WASD/Arrow Keys = Move
Mouse = Look Around
Space = Jump
Control/Command = Sprint
Shift = Sneak

Controller

Left Stick = Move
Right Stick = Look Around
Button A/Button B = Jump
Button X/Button Y = Sprint
Shoulder L/Shoulder R = Sneak
